top_comments_top.body:
Hello and welcome to r/LifeProTips!

Please help us decide if this post is a good fit for the subreddit by up or downvoting this comment. 

If you think that this is great advice to improve your life, please upvote. If you think this doesn't help you in any way, please downvote. If you don't care, leave it for the others to decide.

I’m not sure if it’s exactly the same, but windows key + v brings up the clipboard as well, showing everything you previously copied

In fact I read that article and they mention win+v as well lol
This is actually not great for security if you’ve copied a password or something recently.

And if you want something far superior, 'Ditto clipboard manager'...
I can't work on windows without it.
I was literally thinking yesterday that it would be a good idea and save me loads of time if they could do this! This is the first life pro tip I will actually use. Well done
